mainSequence.step: Designer requests design requirements from Project Team
Project Team queries user needs and preferences to User Research
User Research provides user insights to Project Team
Project Team requests brand guidelines from Design Guidelines
Design Guidelines provide brand guidelines to Designer
Designer analyzes user insights and brand guidelines
Designer submits wireframe for feedback to Project Team
Project Team provides feedback to Designer
Designer revises wireframe based on feedback
Designer resubmits revised wireframe to Project Team
Designer starts design implementation based on approved wireframe in CMS
